channel.title: Simple switch to turn off the lfo
channel.description:
Hi, i have a simple noob question... i have an LFO connected to three filter (LP, HP, BP) this 3 filter goes to a mixer.
Question a: there is a switch with multi in and 1 out to use for change the filter type? Question b: the LFO is always active, there is a switch to put in the middle of LFO and the filter pitch?
thanks

item.title: Simple switch to turn off the lfo
item.dc:creator: @urbanspaceman francesco
item.description:
@urbanspaceman wrote:

wo! it works! Thanks @janvantomme

Read full topic
item.source: Simple switch to turn off the lfo

item.title: Simple switch to turn off the lfo
item.dc:creator: @janvantomme Jan Vantomme
item.description:
@janvantomme wrote:

Take a look at the multiplexer and demultiplexer objects. You can find them in the mux and demux folders in the object selector. A toggle control and counter object can be used to switch between inputs or outputs.

You can find a patch that shows how to use the mux object in the File > Library > tutorials menu: 06_envelopes.axp

Read full topic
item.source: Simple switch to turn off the lfo
